column1: A decade after I landed in a C-130 in Iraq @PeteButtigieg stepped off a C-17 in Afghanistan. Pete understands America’s role in the world and is uniquely suited for this moment  Pete is the right person to take on and defeat Trump and lead us into a better future #TeamPete https://t.co/MDkB4ENvaD

This is absurd!  Does that suggest that a serial extortionist is immune from criminal prosecution because the extortionist publicly shakes people down for money?  C’mon colleague you know better than that. https://t.co/tI5BScV6YE
